author: CBC News
title: Outbreak of COVID-19 declared at Credit Valley Hospital in Mississauga
description: An outbreak of COVID-19 has been declared at Credit Valley Hospital in Mississauga after four patients in one unit tested positive for the virus.
content:
An outbreak of COVID-19 has been declared at Credit Valley Hospital in Mississauga after four patients in one unit tested positive for the virus.
Trillium Health Partners (THP), a hospital which encompasses three sites including Credit Valley Hospital, said … [+2444 chars]
